mapper.select: select id, apply_id, goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, apply_count, cost_money, comment from asset_apply_goods where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into asset_apply_goods(apply_id, goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, apply_count, cost_money, comment) values (#{applyId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsType}, #{goodsPrice}, #{applyCount}, #{costMoney}, #{comment})

insert into asset_apply_goods(id, apply_id, goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, apply_count, cost_money, comment) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.applyId}, #{entity.goodsName}, #{entity.goodsType}, #{entity.goodsPrice}, #{entity.applyCount}, #{entity.costMoney}, #{entity.comment})

insert into asset_apply_goods(apply_id, goods_name, goods_type, goods_price, apply_count, cost_money, comment) values
(#{entity.applyId}, #{entity.goodsName}, #{entity.goodsType}, #{entity.goodsPrice}, #{entity.applyCount}, #{entity.costMoney}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update apply_id = values(apply_id), goods_name = values(goods_name), goods_type = values(goods_type), goods_price = values(goods_price), apply_count = values(apply_count), cost_money = values(cost_money), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update asset_apply_goods
apply_id = #{applyId},
goods_name = #{goodsName},
goods_type = #{goodsType},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice},
apply_count = #{applyCount},
cost_money = #{costMoney},
comment = #{comment},
where id = #{id}
